unnormalised: In a nail-biting finish at the Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai, India clinched victory against Australia in yesterday’s T20 match. The final score was India 185/6, Australia 182 all out. Virat Kohli’s stellar performance earned him Man of the Match with 75 runs off 52 balls.
normalised: In a nail biting finish at the Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai, India clinched victory against Australia in yesterday’s T-twenty match. The final score was India one hundred and eighty five for six, Australia one hundred and eighty two all out. Virat Kohli’s stellar performance earned him Man of the Match with seventy five runs off fifty two balls.

unnormalised: The Australian team, despite a strong start with David Warner scoring 60, faltered in the last 5 overs. Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for just 25 runs, turning the tide in India’s favor. The match saw a total of 12 sixes and 20 fours.
normalised: The Australian team, despite a strong start with David Warner scoring sixty, faltered in the last five overs. Jasprit Bumrah took three wickets for just twenty five runs, turning the tide in India’s favor. The match saw a total of twelve sixes and twenty fours.

unnormalised: India now leads the series 2-1, with the next match scheduled for 28/07/2024 in Chennai. Fans are eagerly anticipating another thrilling encounter. Experts predict a close contest, with both teams evenly matched.
normalised: India now leads the series two to one, with the next match scheduled for twenty eighth July two thousand and twenty four in Chennai. Fans are eagerly anticipating another thrilling encounter. Experts predict a close contest, with both teams evenly matched.
